Articles.Content:
I'm trying to make two KSP vids before the end of summer. I have one idea down (do you guys think Val, Jeb, Bill, and Bob would be related?) and a Olympics Idea down. Though I need help. I need help of sport Ideas. I have a couple basic ones, Jumping, Swimming, running, Climbing, as well as KSP-y stuff sports, like sky diving, Demolition derby, rover driving, RCS space race, plane flying, etc, but need more sports for it to be an "Olympics". And more specific things in the sports. Ideas?

https://youtu.be/TT0FK_6uD_8

Trailer for first movie!

Edited August 15, 2015 by Spacetraindriver
